00007 #include "mexopencv.hpp"

00009 using namespace cv;

00011 // Persistent objects
00012 namespace {
00014 int last_id = 0;
00016 map<int,CvDTree> obj_;

00023 CvDTreeParams getParams(vector<MxArray>::iterator it,
00024                         vector<MxArray>::iterator end)
00025 {
00026     CvDTreeParams params;
00027     for (;it<end;it+=2) {
00028         string key((*it).toString());
00029         MxArray& val = *(it+1);
00030         if (key=="MaxDepth")
00031             params.max_depth = val.toInt();
00032         else if (key=="MinSampleCount")
00033             params.min_sample_count = val.toInt();
00034         else if (key=="RegressionAccuracy")
00035             params.regression_accuracy = val.toDouble();
00036         else if (key=="UseSurrogates")
00037             params.use_surrogates = val.toBool();
00038         else if (key=="MaxCategories")
00039             params.max_categories = val.toInt();
00040         else if (key=="CVFolds")
00041             params.cv_folds = val.toInt();
00042         else if (key=="Use1seRule")
00043             params.use_1se_rule = val.toBool();
00044         else if (key=="TruncatePrunedTree")
00045             params.truncate_pruned_tree = val.toBool();
00046         //else
00047         //    mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00048     }
00049     return params;
00050 }
00051 
00054 MxArray paramsToMxArray(CvDTreeParams& params)
00055 {
00056     const char* fields[] = {"MaxCategories","MaxDepth","MinSampleCount",
00057         "CVFolds","UseSurrogates","Use1seRule","TruncatePrunedTree",
00058         "RegressionAccuracy"};
00059     MxArray m(fields,8);
00060     m.set("MaxCategories",params.max_categories);
00061     m.set("MaxDepth",params.max_depth);
00062     m.set("MinSampleCount",params.min_sample_count);
00063     m.set("CVFolds",params.cv_folds);
00064     m.set("UseSurrogates",params.use_surrogates);
00065     m.set("Use1seRule",params.use_1se_rule);
00066     m.set("TruncatePrunedTree",params.truncate_pruned_tree);
00067     m.set("RegressionAccuracy",params.regression_accuracy);
00068     return m;
00069 }
00070 }
00071 
00079 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00080                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00081 {
00082     if (nlhs>1)
00083         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00084     
00085     // Determine argument format between constructor or (id,method,...)
00086     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00087     int id = 0;
00088     string method;
00089     if (nrhs==0) {
00090         // Constructor is called. Create a new object from argument
00091         obj_[++last_id] = CvDTree();
00092         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00093         return;
00094     }
00095     else if (rhs[0].isNumeric() && rhs[0].numel()==1 && nrhs>1) {
00096         id = rhs[0].toInt();
00097         method = rhs[1].toString();
00098     }
00099     else
00100         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid arguments");
00101     
00102     // Big operation switch
00103     CvDTree& obj = obj_[id];
00104     if (method == "delete") {
00105         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs!=0)
00106             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Output not assigned");
00107         obj_.erase(id);
00108     }
00109     else if (method == "clear") {
00110         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs!=0)
00111             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00112         obj.clear();
00113     }
00114     else if (method == "load") {
00115         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs!=0)
00116             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00117         obj.load(rhs[2].toString().c_str());
00118     }
00119     else if (method == "save") {
00120         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs!=0)
00121             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00122         obj.save(rhs[2].toString().c_str());
00123     }
00124     else if (method == "train") {
00125         if (nrhs<4 || nlhs>1)
00126             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00127         Mat trainData(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00128         Mat responses(rhs[3].toMat(CV_32F));
00129         Mat varIdx, sampleIdx, missing_mask;
00130         Mat varType(1,trainData.cols+1,CV_8U,Scalar(CV_VAR_ORDERED));
00131         varType.at<uchar>(0,trainData.cols) = CV_VAR_CATEGORICAL;
00132         CvDTreeParams params = getParams(rhs.begin()+4,rhs.end());
00133         vector<float> priors;
00134         for (int i=4; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00135             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00136             if (key=="VarIdx")
00137                 varIdx = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32S);
00138             else if (key=="SampleIdx")
00139                 sampleIdx = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32S);
00140             else if (key=="VarType") {
00141                 if (rhs[i+1].isChar())
00142                     varType.at<uchar>(0,trainData.cols) = 
00143                         (rhs[i+1].toString()=="Categorical") ? 
00144                         CV_VAR_CATEGORICAL : CV_VAR_ORDERED;
00145                 else if (rhs[i+1].isNumeric())
00146                     varType = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_8U);
00147             }
00148             else if (key=="MissingMask")
00149                 missing_mask = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_8U);
00150             else if (key=="Priors") {
00151                 MxArray& m = rhs[i+1];
00152                 priors.reserve(m.numel());
00153                 for (int j=0; j<m.numel(); ++j)
00154                     priors.push_back(m.at<float>(j));
00155                 params.priors = &priors[0];
00156             }
00157         }
00158         bool b = obj.train(trainData, CV_ROW_SAMPLE, responses, varIdx,
00159             sampleIdx, varType, missing_mask, params);
00160         plhs[0] = MxArray(b);
00161     }
00162     else if (method == "predict") {
00163         if (nrhs<3 || nlhs>1)
00164             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00165         Mat samples(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F)), missingDataMask;
00166         bool preprocessedInput=false;
00167         for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00168             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00169             if (key=="MissingMask")
00170                 missingDataMask = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_8U);
00171             else if (key=="PreprocessedInput")
00172                 preprocessedInput = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00173         }
00174         Mat results(samples.rows,1,CV_64F);
00175         for (int i=0; i<samples.rows; ++i)
00176             results.at<double>(i,0) = obj.predict(samples.row(i))->value;
00177         plhs[0] = MxArray(results);
00178     }
00179     else if (method == "getVarImportance") {
00180         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs>1)
00181             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00182         const CvMat* m = obj.get_var_importance();
00183         plhs[0] = MxArray((m) ? Mat(m) : Mat());
00184     }
00185     else if (method == "get_pruned_tree_idx") {
00186         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs>1)
00187             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00188         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.get_pruned_tree_idx());
00189     }
00190     else if (method == "params") {
00191         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs>1)
00192             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00193         CvDTreeTrainData* d = obj.get_data();
00194         plhs[0] = (d) ? paramsToMxArray(d->params) : MxArray(Mat());
00195     }
00196     else
00197         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized operation");
00198 }
